Here is the generated MCQ:

What must you do when you move to a new address in the United States as an F-1 student?

A) Notify your DSO within 5 days of the change of address
B) Update your registration in SEVIS yourself
C) Notify your DSO within 10 days of the change of address
D) Report your new address to the Department of Homeland Security (DHS)

Correct answer: C) Notify your DSO within 10 days of the change of address

Here is a multiple-choice question based on the provided text:

What must you do if you have been out of the United States for more than five months?

A) Contact your DSO and obtain a new I-20
B) Provide the necessary documents to re-enter the US
C) Contact your DSO for guidance on how to proceed
D) Return to the US immediately without any further action

Correct answer: C) Contact your DSO for guidance on how to proceed

What is the purpose of issuing a Form I-20 by a Designated School Official (DSO)?

A) To apply for a visa
B) To attest to the authenticity of the student's documents
C) To certify the student's enrollment in a full course of study
D) To deny the student's request for admission to the United States

Correct answer: C) To certify the student's enrollment in a full course of study
